about_the_game:
A set of printable artwork from game for Hentai Queens fans.
Brings all levels artwork on some dimensions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
